summary: Sales management system with SMS and print functionality for sell bills

existing_features.title: Generate a printable sell bill when saving a product sale that includes farmer name, product name, price per unit, quantity, total amount, date and time, and company header ('ANMOL DAIRY LIFE')
In SellModule.tsx, trigger the print dialog immediately after successfully saving a product sale to the backend
Create a reusable utility function similar to pdfGenerator.ts that generates HTML content for the sell bill with proper styling for print media

new_feature_requests.summary: Print sell bill while saving with farmer name, product name, price, quantity, amount, date/time, and company header
